name: One Swing Batter
description:
Made for the Game Makers Toolkit Jam 2019

One Swing Batter is an arcade shooter where you are armed with a baseball bat and you have only one devastating swing to take out as many robots as you can.

Collect coins and upgrade your inevitable attack, while surviving the relentless robot assault.

Works with mouse and keyboard, or controller. Tested with Xbox 360 controller. No guarantee for other types of controllers.

Software used:

  • Unity
  • Reaper
  • Audacity
  • Paint.net
  • GraphicsGale
  • BeebBox (https://www.beepbox.co/)
